channel.title: Microservices on Himanshu Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Microservices on Himanshu Shah

item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Automated the manual process of adding third-party segments to the database by adding an upload option in the UI using Angular creating a new microservice in Golang using AWS Lambda, APIGateway, and S3; saved 6+ engineer hours per week Developing a feature for transcoding videos to audio using AWS MediaConvert, SNS, DynamoDB, and EventBridge, increasing the bid eligibility for clientsâ€™ ad campaigns and thereby increasing the generated revenue Contributed to the architecture for the Video-to-Audio Conversion project Leveraged Go Generics to make it easier to add/fetch objects from DynamoDB
